title: Can I get help with writing a paper with good citation using APA format in order to maximise my essay score? - Quora

response.answer_text: OWL Perdue had your full APA and MLA citation needs. Or you can hire me to work on your paper with you. Zoom sessions available on request.  O Quora Bot Behold the haiku I wrote Don’t hide short answer.

I’m sure you can get help, particularly if you are prepared to pay for it. The question is should you do so? My answer to that question is no! You’ll see my thinking in a response to a similar question, here: Chris Atkins's answer to Will you help me complete my MA English literature third semester syllabus?
